get.description: Initialize and install data in the database.

post.description: Register a new user with a username, email, and password.
Log in a user and return a JWT token.
Create a new admin user. Only accessible by existing admins.

delete.description: Delete a user by ID. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

put.description: Update user data. Accessible by the user themselves or by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users. Accessible by admins only.

post.description: Create a new professor. Only accessible by admins.

requestBody.description: Details for creating a new professor

get.description: Retrieve a teacher's data by ID, authenticated users only.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the professor to retrieve

put.description: Update a professor's details. Accessible by admins or the professor themselves.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the professor to update

delete.description: Delete a professor by ID. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the professor to delete

get.description: Retrieve a list of all professors with pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of professors to return per page

post.description: Create a new student record. Only accessible by admins.

requestBody.description: Details for creating a new student

get.description: Retrieve details of a student by their enrollment number. Accessible by any authenticated user.

parameters.name: enrollmentNumber
parameters.description: Enrollment number of the student to retrieve

put.description: Update details of a student by their enrollment number. Accessible by admins or the student themselves.

parameters.name: enrollmentNumber
parameters.description: Enrollment number of the student to update

delete.description: Delete a student record by enrollment number. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: enrollmentNumber
parameters.description: Enrollment number of the student to delete

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all students. Accessible by any user.

post.description: Create a new course record. Only accessible by admins.

requestBody.description: Details for creating a new course

get.description: Retrieve details of a course by its ID. Accessible by any user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to retrieve

put.description: Update details of a course by its ID. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

delete.description: Delete a course record by ID. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to delete

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all courses. Accessible by any user.
Retrieve a summary of students distribution and average course capacity.
